values.label: Hardware platform
values.comment: Code to identify the type of hardware installed in a computer environment e.g. PC, Mac, UNIX-Workstation, Mini, Mainframe.

values.label: Operating system
values.comment: Code to identify the operating system, like DOS, VMS, etc. used in a computer environment.

values.label: Application software
values.comment: Code to identify an application software, like AutoCad, WinWord, etc. used in a computer environment.

values.label: Network
values.comment: Code to identify a network like Ethernet, Token Ring, etc. implemented in a computer environment.

values.label: Sending system
values.comment: Code to identify the system, which acts as a sending system in an interchange.

values.label: File generating software
values.comment: Software used to generate a file.

values.label: File compression software
values.comment: Software used for the compression of a file.

values.label: File compression method
values.comment: Method used for the compression of a file.
